name: AirPlaneHitEnemyWithBossGameDemo
description:
I miss my childhood shooting game, so I made this simple game. The content of the game is not much at present. There are only 4 random levels, 4 BOSS, 12 different enemies, 3 props and 3 weapons. And through the obtained POINT to unlock the other two aircraft, each aircraft has different initial attributes and initial weapons. Finally, thank you for playing.

New content will be uploaded slowly in the future

PS   :    If the player can’t shoot the bullet at the beginning, please click the upper right corner to exit to the interface and start again, which will solve the problem of not being able to shoot the bullet.

PPS :  this game no sound effect

Use UpLeftDownRight Arrow Control Your Plane.
